pr_title: Update Play root span only if there is one

timeline.message: Update Play root span only if there is one

timeline.bodyText: This null check already happens inside the onRequest call.  I don't think this PR is necessary.
timeline.author: tylerbenson

replies.bodyText: That's inaccurate. The first call in PlayHttpServerDecorator.onRequest is to HttpServerDecorator.onRequest which asserts on the first line that the span is not null. On a more general note, the description of the PR states that this error was encountered running play's test suite, and getting a clean run on the Play 2.8 test suite was the motivation for doing the work.
replies.author: richardstartin

replies.bodyText: oops. sorry, I misread the null check in onRequest.  Carry on!
replies.author: tylerbenson
